description:
Domon goes looking for Allenby because she went missing. He yelled at Rain because she was supposed to look after Allenby. Fuun Saiki, Master Asia`s horse, comes and delivers Domon to Master Asia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der ultimative Angriff! Das Duell gegen Master Asia
La Paume qui fend le ciel ! Duel contre Master Asia
The Ultimate Attack! Duel with Master Asia
石破天驚拳! 決闘マスター・アジア
